thread.title: Hilton times square
thread.title_full: Hilton times square - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elzshan
title: Hilton times square
text:
Just arrived home had an amazing first time in new York hotel was perfect room clean and big with fantastic views.
But please be aware on the reception ask for my credit card on arrival i was unaware they had taken money about 100 pound not one word was said about this once I realised I ask what this was for to be told it would be returned once I leave checked out yesterday morning ask about deposit and was told it would go back straight away I'm home now and still no money iv tried to talk to someone but now they saying the details I'm giving are different to what they have, iv emailed but no reply
Not a good end to a fantastic holiday
